hadith.text: Abu Qilabah AL-Jarmi narrated that Abu Umayyah Ad-Damri told them that:he came to the Messenger of Allah from a journey and he said: "Come and have a meal for breakfast, O Abu Umayyah." I said: 'I am fasting; He said: 'Come close and I will tell you about the traveler. Allah, most high, has waived fasting and half of the prayer for him
